name: ListeningQuiz
0:
”Alexa, open Listening Quiz”
”Alexa, start Listening Quiz”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: listening quiz
des: Alexa will read aloud to you and ask you questions about each passage. Test your listening comprehension by remembering facts and details. Answer correctly and achieve a high score. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
